description.value: Actual intake or consumption of alcohol.

purpose.value: To record details about actual consumption of alcohol at a specified point in time or over an identified period of time.

definition.value: Actual intake or consumption of alcohol.
@ internal @
Amount of alcohol defining a standard drink.
Amount of alcohol defining a standard drink.
Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
@ internal @
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
